LibTextCodec: Make UTF16BEDecoder read only up to an even offset

Reading up to the end of the input string of odd length results in
an out-of-bounds read
Bug Filter Response:
The patch addresses a buffer overflow issue in the UTF16BEDecoder, preventing an out-of-bounds read that could be exploited. 

**Final Classification:** Security Vulnerability Fix  
**Confidence Score:** 0.95
